title: A bullet of fresh air!
review: Maybe one of the best if not the best bond movie ever to come out on the big screen. Simple plot, motives, great characters and James bond at his lowest and best at the same time. Needs more appreciation.

title: Into the spider-fest!
review: Understands completely the character and what it means to the fans. Stunning animation and relatable characters but most importantly it has a heart. Maybe the best Spider-Man movie.
